quote: Take time like the river that never grows stale. Keep going and steady. No hurry, no rush. – Rumi
fact: Lorne Greene had one of his nipples bitten off by an alligator while he was host of "Lorne Greene`s Wild Kingdom."
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: Why was the broom late for the meeting? He overswept.
